metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11879 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GNOME Evolution before 3.35.91. By using the proprietary (non-RFC6068) "mailto?attach=..." parameter, a website (or other source of mailto links) can make Evolution attach local files or directories to a composed email message without showing a warning to the user, as demonstrated by an attach=. value.

criterions.comment: evolution: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
